item.description:
Boston / Cambridge SEO Internet Marketing Networking Group

We invite local Boston seo, affiliate marketing and search engine marketing professionals in New England area to join us.

Location:

Robbins Library
Mass Ave
Arlington, MA

Agenda:

6:30pm to 7pm: Open Networking

Business Card Buffet: drop you card on the networking buffet

*Food Sponsor WANTED*

7pm to 7:30: 2 Min Elevator Pitch:

* Tell us about you and your business or website interest
* Any networking goal your trying to achieve out of this meeting?

7:30 - 8:00 Guest Speaker: Chris Brooks of FixItYourself.com.

12 Domaining Tricks Every SEO Should Know

Speculating on domain names has long had a somewhat seedy reputation: it is associated with "cyber-squatters", redirecting expired domains to adult sites and ridiculously wealthy people living in the Cayman Islands. But if you haven't dabbled in domains recently you probably don't know how useful they can be as a search engine optimization tool.

The talk will focus on the following questions:


  • How good domains can affect your search engine ranking
  • Techniques for choosing between different "good" domains
  • When you re-brand your existing site with a new domain name
  • A (small) handful of techniques to help you find good domain names at good prices
  • Domaining business models to avoid



8:00 - 8:15 Q & A

8:15 - 8:45 Open Discussion & Challenge Questions

8:45pm The End

We look forward to seeing you all at this informal Boston search engine round table discussion!


The Cambridge SEO MeetUp

----------------------------------
Guest Speaker's Wanted:

We've been working hard to find industry experts and to develop a formal agenda to keep it interesting for all those that attend at this new big meeting room.

Food Event Sponsors:

SEO Pro's, will work for food! Contact us about sponsoring the event with goodies and drinks in exchange for publicity.

group.name: The Cambridge Search Engine Optimization Meetup Group

item.name: BostonSEO.org SEO Internet Marketing Networking Event
